successes.title: The Ridge: Front Pocket Wallet
successes.description: More than a minimalist wallet. An Aluminum, Titanium, and Carbon Fiber RFID-blocking card holder and money clip.

Pledges.description: As a thanks to the first 100 supporters, we're knocking $5 off the price. The "New" Bridge in black or silver.
The "New" Bridge in brushed, anodized black.
The "New" Bridge in brushed, anodized silver.
The "New" Bridge in brushed, anodized black (without engraved logo).
KICKSTARTER SPECIAL EDITION: The "New" Ridge in brushed, anodized, black aluminum with green elastic.
As a thanks to the first 100 supporters, we're knocking $5 off the price. The "Classic" Bridge in black or silver with integrated stainless steel money clip.
The "Classic" Bridge in brushed, anodized black with integrated stainless steel money clip.
The "Classic" Bridge in brushed, anodized silver with integrated stainless steel money clip.
The "Classic" Bridge in brushed, anodized black with integrated stainless steel money clip (without engraved logo).
The "New" Ridge in anodized silver with silver Titanium outer plates
The "New" Bridge in anodized black with black Titanium outer plates
The "Classic" Ridge in anodized silver with silver Titanium outer plates and Titanium money clip.
The "Classic" Ridge in black with anodized black Titanium outer plates and black Titanium money clip.
